name: Thoughtful Trainer - Made in 3 hours
description:
You are a trainer, spot the talented student and win points.

Submitted as part of the 333 gameJam challenge by Anicet Nougaret (me)

How to play

R - Start recording

R - Stop recording

ZQSD / arrows - Move the trainer

Mouse and click - Spot the student that repoduces the movement with the most precision.

What's the 333 challenge ?

Make a 3D game in 3 hours with only 3 colors. In 3 hours you have to find the idea by picking 1 random noun (here trainer) and 1 random adjective (here thoughtful), brainstorm, code, make the art, build, and publish on itch.io

It's like a gamejam but there are no goals, do it whenever you want to train your skills and send me what you accomplish in 3 hours.
